dialogue: We have a location on the enemy!
That's great news! I'll send out some of our top field-agents to check it out
I'll get the communication system up and running!
It's just another system that the enemy could potentially target..
{userName} is right, but it is all we've got
If they take out our communication system, those field-agents will be stranded out there, with no way of talking to us
Then we have to make doubly sure that the enemy does not destroy this system with a missi-
Why did I have to say something...
